Executive Officer Philip Krim, dismissed around 30 employees as part of 
a reorganization associated with its evolution into a so-called 
multi-channel business, ...</div><div class="wxp1Sb"><span class="YCV9ed isfR2"><span class="WG9SHc"><span>Dec 12, 2019</span></span></span></div></div></div></div></a><div></div></div></div></div></g-card></div><div><g-card class="nChh6e DyOREb" data-hveid="213"><div><div><div></div><div class="dbsr" data-ved="0ahUKEwjHgMOk-PTpAhUEGc0KHXSqCEs4ZBDE9AEI1gEoADAd"><a style="text-decoration:none;display:block" href="https://www.bloomberg.com/opinion/articles/2019-12-19/traders-heard-a-speech-too-soon" data-ved="0ahUKEwjHgMOk-PTpAhUEGc0KHXSqCEs4ZBDF9AEI1wEwHQ" ping="/url?sa=t&amp;source=web&amp;rct=j&amp;url=https://www.bloomberg.com/opinion/articles/2019-12-19/traders-heard-a-speech-too-soon&amp;ved=0ahUKEwjHgMOk-PTpAhUEGc0KHXSqCEs4ZBDF9AEI1wEwHQ" target="_blank" rel="noopener"><div class="yr3B8d KWQBje"><div class="vC5xic"><div class="sYpfDb" style="width:112px;height:112px"><div class="qV9w7d" style="height:112px;border-radius:8px"><div class="KNcnob" style="height:112px;width:112px;background-color:#d1ebf9"><g-img><img id="dimg_115" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIAAAP///////yH5BAEKAAEALAAAAAABAAEAAAICTAEAOw==" data-deferred="1" class="rISBZc M4dUYb" height="112" width="112" alt=""></g-img></div></div></div></div><div class="hI5pFf"><div class="XTjFC WF4CUc"><g-img class="QyR1Ze"><img id="dimg_117" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIAAAP///////yH5BAEKAAEALAAAAAABAAEAAAICTAEAOw==" data-deferred="1" class="rISBZc M4dUYb" height="16" width="16" alt=""></g-img>Bloomberg</div><div class="JheGif nDgy9d" aria-level="2" role="heading" style="-webkit-line-clamp:2">Traders Heard a Speech Too Soon</div><div class="yJHHTd"><div class="Y3v8qd">... is probably an electronic trading firm, or really multiple electronic

Rubenstein Show ...</div><div class="wxp1Sb"><span class="YCV9ed isfR2"><span class="WG9SHc"><span>Dec 11, 2019</span></span></span></div></div></div></div></a><div></div></div></div></div></g-card></div><div><g-card class="nChh6e DyOREb" data-hveid="489"><div><div><div></div><div class="dbsr" data-ved="0ahUKEwjHgMOk-PTpAhUEGc0KHXSqCEs4ZBDE9AEI6gMoADBL"><a style="text-decoration:none;display:block" href="https://www.bloomberg.com/opinion/articles/2019-12-30/success-at-citizens-bank-after-rbs-spinoff" data-ved="0ahUKEwjHgMOk-PTpAhUEGc0KHXSqCEs4ZBDF9AEI6wMwSw" ping="/url?sa=t&amp;source=web&amp;rct=j&amp;url=https://www.bloomberg.com/opinion/articles/2019-12-30/success-at-citizens-bank-after-rbs-spinoff&amp;ved=0ahUKEwjHgMOk-PTpAhUEGc0KHXSqCEs4ZBDF9AEI6wMwSw" target="_blank" rel="noopener"><div class="yr3B8d KWQBje"><div class="vC5xic"><div class="sYpfDb" style="width:112px;height:112px"><div class="qV9w7d" style="height:112px;border-radius:8px"><div class="KNcnob" style="height:112px;width:112px"><g-img><img id="dimg_299" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIAAAP///////yH5BAEKAAEALAAAAAABAAEAAAICTAEAOw==" data-deferred="1" class="rISBZc M4dUYb" height="112" width="112" alt=""></g-img></div></div></div></div><div class="hI5pFf"><div class="XTjFC WF4CUc"><g-img class="QyR1Ze"><img id="dimg_301" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIAAAP///////yH5BAEKAAEALAAAAAABAAEAAAICTAEAOw==" data-deferred="1" class="rISBZc M4dUYb" height="16" width="16" alt=""></g-img>Bloomberg</div><div class="JheGif nDgy9d" aria-level="2" role="heading" style="-webkit-line-clamp:2">Success at Citizens Bank After RBS Spinoff</div><div class="yJHHTd"><div class="Y3v8qd">Cookie Policy.
